identity.name: PULSE OF THE CITY
identity.target_audience: Young adults (21-40), Nightlife enthusiasts, Locals & Tourists

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-black tracking-tighter uppercase leading-none
usage.caption: text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-widest text-gray-500

typography.installation: Import 'Unbounded' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css

colors.rules: Dark mode is default. No white backgrounds. Use 'zinc-900' or 'black' for surfaces. Text is never pure white (#FFFFFF), use #EDEDED or #E5E5E5 for body to reduce eye strain.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.5)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: border border-white/20 hover:border-white/100 hover:bg-white/10 text-white uppercase tracking-wider transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-gray-400 hover:text-primary hover:bg-transparent uppercase tracking-widest text-xs

cards.event: bg-card border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors group relative overflow-hidden
cards.city: aspect-[3/4] relative overflow-hidden group cursor-pointer border-0

inputs.default: bg-muted border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 text-white placeholder:text-gray-600

navigation.bottom_nav: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-white/10 z-50 h-16 flex items-center justify-around

visual_enhancers.grain: Use a fixed 'noise' overlay with opacity-5 pointer-events-none z-50 mix-blend-overlay
visual_enhancers.marquee: Use for breaking news or promoter announcements. Slow speed, large text.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}

media.image_style: High contrast, saturated, slightly grainy. Use duotone filters (Cyan/Magenta) for background images.
media.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone or Fill) or Lucide React. Use 'w-5 h-5' or 'w-6 h-6' standard.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add Google Fonts import for Unbounded and Manrope to index.css.
3. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle. The app is for nightlife.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'CitySelector' as the landing hero. It must be immersive.
5. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn for complex logic (Forms, Dialogs) but strip their default styling to match the 'Neon/Dark' aesthetic.
6. DATA: Use the provided image URLs for mock data. Do not use placeholders.
7. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'city-card-miami', 'login-btn').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
